special.title: Special Services | M√ùVAL
special.heroDesc: Deep carpet cleaning and professional impregnation of firefighter intervention garments with Miele & Kreussler technology.
special.carpetDesc: Deep cleaning of carpets with short and long pile. Option to arrange carpet washing with the customer (if the carpet is suitable due to its material composition). In such cases, the carpet is treated even more effectively, the carpet pile has more vivid colors and contamination is removed with even higher probability.
special.carpetWarningText: When deciding on carpet washing treatment, customer consent is required. Be aware of the risk that the carpet may lose its backing strength, edge stitching strength, or may come unglued (in the case of glued edges).
special.impregDesc: Surface hydrophobic (water-repellent) treatment of firefighter intervention garments and sports clothing. We treat clothing with professional Miele & Kreussler technology, which has been tested on firefighter intervention garments.
special.impregRenewalText: Surface hydrophobic treatment is not permanent on garments. Its functionality diminishes with use, as various factors affect the fabric ‚Äì dirt, body oils, friction, repeated washing. Therefore, hydrophobic treatment needs to be regularly renewed. The renewal frequency depends on the clothing material and usage pattern.
